solution_line_template: First find the time Harry spends eating: {time_for_coffee_bagel} minutes * {multiplier_for_reading_eating} = <<{time_for_coffee_bagel}*{multiplier_for_reading_eating}={time_for_reading_eating}>>{time_for_reading_eating} minutes

Then add the time he spends buying breakfast to find the total time: {time_for_reading_eating} minutes + {time_for_coffee_bagel} minutes = <<{time_for_reading_eating}+{time_for_coffee_bagel}={total_routine_time}>>{total_routine_time} minutes
